Articles.Content:
Does anyone plays it?

I started playing a year ago but I don't play as frequent as I want to (shortage os players and time) so I don't get to practice much. I'm starint this thread to with intend to gather around players to talk about the game, discuss strategies and play online (if possible, I know about a softwares but I don't know about legality or praticality of it).

I play as Rebel Alliance/Resistance and my current collection goes as far as wave 5 and Rebel Transport. My two latest aquisitions were the HWK-290 and the Z-95 Headhunter. I like the HWK but I don't know if I would be able to adapt my playstile to it and use it at it's best. Any suggestions?
